quote: Of course the fall semester didn’t start for another eight weeks or so. There was always a chance we were both being overly optimistic in thinking I’d be alive when it rolled around.
quote_letters: OF COURSE THE FALL SEMESTER DIDNT START FOR ANOTHER EIGHT WEEKS OR SO THERE WAS ALWAYS A CHANCE WE WERE BOTH BEING OVERLY OPTIMISTIC IN THINKING ID BE ALIVE WHEN IT ROLLED AROUND
